titles.title: IRE Act
Irish Immigration Recognition and Encouragement Act of 2011
A bill to authorize the Secretary of State to issue up to 10,500 E-3 visas per year to Irish nationals.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: 12/15/2011--Introduced. Irish Immigration Recognition and Encouragement Act of 2011 or IRE Act - Amends the Immigration and Nationality Act to include nationals of Ireland coming to the United States under a treaty of commerce to perform specialty occupation services in the nonimmigrant E-3 visa category.
